metadata.title: USN-7125-1 -- RapidJSON vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that RapidJSON incorrectly parsed numbers written in scientific notation, leading to an integer underflow. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7125-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  rapidjson-dev - 1.1.0+dfsg2-7.2ubuntu0.1~esm1 rapidjson-doc - 1.1.0+dfsg2-7.2ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
